Lattice Protocol — The beginning of a new era!!

Lattice Protocol — The Research

Lattice recently concluded a research on e-Sellers and small Businesses to spot the challenges they face in current ecosystem. The survey was conducted across 3 countries and 12 cities which included 1st, 2nd and 3rd tier participants.

The survey participants were initially asked open ended questions, but then to bring in objectivity to the discussion, a 15 parameter challenge list was presented from amongst the common list which evolved out of the initial discussion.

READ MORE

A view on the issues faced by current marketplace models:

When the world speaks about Collaboration, Brands, and Targeted Positioning, the current marketplaces stands completely antagonistic to most of these views. Couple it with the cases of information privacy breach, it really poses a big question on the existing models and subconsciously raises a desire for a supermodel that can save the next gen marketplace goers.
